verses.esv: 23 But whoever has doubts is condemned if he eats, because the eating is not from faith. For whatever does not proceed from faith is sin.
verses.kjv: 23 And he that doubteth is damned if he eat, because he eateth not of faith: for whatsoever is not of faith is sin.
verses.niv: 23 But the man who has doubts is condemned if he eats, because his eating is not from faith; and everything that does not come from faith is sin.

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv:
8   The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD,
    but the prayer of the upright is acceptable to him.
verses.kjv: 8 The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.
verses.niv: 8 The LORD detests the sacrifice of the wicked, but the prayer of the upright pleases him.

verses.esv:
9   If one turns away his ear from hearing the law,
    even his prayer is an abomination.
verses.kjv: 9 He that turneth away his ear from hearing the law, even his prayer shall be abomination.
verses.niv: 9 If anyone turns a deaf ear to the law, even his prayers are detestable.

verses.esv:
27   The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination;
    how much more when he brings it with evil intent.
verses.kjv: 27 The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination: how much more, when he bringeth it with a wicked mind?
verses.niv: 27 The sacrifice of the wicked is detestable- how much more so when brought with evil intent!

verses.esv:
6   We have all become like one who is unclean,
    and all our righteous deeds are like a polluted garment.
  We all fade like a leaf,
    and our iniquities, like the wind, take us away.
verses.kjv: 6 But we are all as an unclean thing, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf; and our iniquities, like the wind, have taken us away.
verses.niv: 6 All of us have become like one who is unclean, and all our righteous acts are like filthy rags; we all shrivel up like a leaf, and like the wind our sins sweep us away.

verses.esv:
9   The way of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD,
    but he loves him who pursues righteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.
verses.niv: 9 The LORD detests the way of the wicked but he loves those who pursue righteousness.
